snippet.title: Babylon's Fall - TGA 2021 Trailer | PS5, PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/babylons-fall/

Experience acclaimed developer PlatinumGames' signature combat in BABYLON’S FALL with up to 3 other players or take on the Tower of Babel alone, in this new cooperative action RPG. Join forces with other Sentinels, unwilling subjects forcibly implanted with Gideon Coffin, relics that grant the few survivors unrivalled powers. 

 Ascend to greatness as you climb the looming Tower of Babel and uncover its fabled treasures. Only by mastering the powers of your Gideon Coffin, will you unlock your true potential and become strong enough to survive the summit and uncover the secrets that await. 

The epic world of BABYLON’S FALL is coming to the PlayStation®5 (PS5™) console and PlayStation 4.
